articles.title: No link between Covid vaccines used in India and heart attack risk, reveals study - Deccan Herald
articles.description: New Delhi, Sep 4 (PTI) There is no association between the Covid-19 vaccines used in India -- Covishield and Covaxin -- and increase in the risk of heart attacks, according to an observational study which emphasises the protective effect of the jabs.
